sentences.english: Every day, 30 lorries and containers will be made overseas Anping wire mesh.
sentences.chinese: 每天有30輛貨車及集裝箱將安平絲網發往外地。

sentences.english: Anping just do not believe that people will be clones of love, women are not.
sentences.chinese: 安平只是不相信人會有無性的愛，女人也不會。

sentences.english: After learning that Maoxiong is Chunhua's first lover, Anping is shocked.
sentences.chinese: 安平知道茂雄是春華的初戀情人後，感到非常震驚。
我們可以參觀安平古堡。

sentences.english: With Ma Sha's help, Anping is appointed to be the deputy general manager of Universal hotel.
sentences.chinese: 馬沙把安平安插在聯合飯店當副總經理，以監視志忠。

sentences.english: My home in the famous town of wire mesh Anping.
sentences.chinese: 我的家鄉在聞名的絲網之鄉安平。
